scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --debug
scripts.db:reset:online: cross-env NODE_ENV=development_online npx sequelize-cli db:drop && cross-env NODE_ENV=development_online npx sequelize-cli db:create && cross-env NODE_ENV=development_online npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && cross-env NODE_ENV=development_online npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
